template.name: gc-json-dump
template.value:
filename = "bla.json" data = dict() data['id'] = 'Description'
if os.path.exists(filename): with open(filename, "r") as fd: data = json.load(fd) else: print("File does not exist. creating a new file") with open(filename, "w+", encoding='utf-8') as fd: json.dump(data, fd, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
